nodes.text: Jedi Cruisers were transports used by the Jedi Order during the Freedon Nadd Uprising.

Two Jedi Cruisers were sent from Ossus to assist Ulic Qel-Droma and the Galactic Republic on Onderon during the Uprising. They landed under heavy fire on the planet and successfully unloaded their passengers.
This ship type should not be confused with the Jedi Justice Cruiser used millennia later.
